name: Escape From Hell (Androcius)
description:
You are a lucky dead who were given a chance to escape hell, but there is a catch.

You have a limited amount of HP which you can use to defeat enemies or help other helpless souls. Be careful because this game has multiple endings and it`s based on how you use your HP.

Will you go back to the middle world or get stock forever in the under world?

***Okay so this game was made in less than 2 day for MiniJam92 so it`s missing animation and also sound (I`m unfamiliar with sound engineering). If it get`s enough feedback and interest then maybe I`ll fully finish this project, we`ll see :).***
